formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'NBScat' =-
[Synopsis] Play an NBS local stream
[Description] NBScat: Executes nbscat to listen to the local NBS stream. User can exit by pressing any key .

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,6 +4,5 @@ Play an NBS local stream
[Description] - NBScat: Executes nbscat to listen to the local NBS stream. - User can exit by pressing any key - . + NBScat(): Executes nbscat to listen to the local NBS stream. + User can exit by pressing any key.
